name: Firestorm
overview: Firestorm is a top-down shooter, but the game requires a bit of thinking. The titular hero is able to create destructive fire-balls, control computer memory banks and move inanimate objects with the power of telekinesis. He must rescue his girlfriend, who is imprisoned in criminal organization's citadel. This citadel is a big maze, and the game has 12 levels. Firestorm goes through citadel as you fight against enemies and avoid others obstacles like floor sweeps and "derezzers" (pyramid type columns in corridors).
